divs: sighting detailsi was outside and noticed some quick movement in the sw sky. i wasn't sure so i continued to watch. it was amazing in that it was making quick zig zag movements. i got binoculars. now i could see the lights clearly and there were bright red, green and white lights. i could not see enough detail to describe the ufo. i went back into the house to tell my wife and got a second set of binoculars for her to watch. she also saw it. i watched for another 1\2 hour. it kept making the same movements and it was fading into the distance and i quit watching. i have seen the ufo on several subsequent nights.
Summary: bright red, green and white lights making quick irregular movements
